document.full_text: few creditors of lehman brothers holdings  want the court to consider their alternate restructuring plan when the bankrupt investment bank's own proposal comes up for voting in june, court documents show.
document.title: few lehman creditors want court to consider their restructuring
lines_and_colors: few creditors of lehman brothers holdings  want the court to consider their alternate restructuring plan when the bankrupt investment bank's own proposal comes up for voting in june, court documents show.
